headline: Cognizant Technology Solutions’ Shares Jump on Strong Q3 Earnings
summary: Cognizant Technology Solutions (NASDAQ: CTSH) beat on both earnings and revenue Wednesday morning, extending a streak of consistent outperformance while signaling that its AI strategy is beginning to pay off. The stock was trading near $67 in early action, holding steady after a volatile September that had sent shares down sharply before a recovery in ... headline: A Fresh Look at Rubrik (RBRK) Valuation Following Strategic Partnership With Cognizant
summary: Cognizant and Rubrik (NYSE:RBRK) are joining forces to launch a new Business Resilience-as-a-Service solution. This offering targets enterprise needs around cyber recovery and ransomware defense as AI adoption accelerates across industries. See our latest analysis for Rubrik. Rubrik's collaboration with Cognizant comes at a time when the stock has already caught investors' attention. Its 1-year total shareholder return has soared 78.7%. Even so, the last month saw a 7.3% drop in the share...

headline: Cognizant raises annual adjusted profit forecast on strong client spending
summary: () -Cognizant Technology raised its full-year 2025 adjusted profit forecast on Wednesday, anticipating a surge in spending from enterprise clients looking to upgrade their digital infrastructure with artificial intelligence. Shares of the Teaneck, New Jersey-based IT consulting company rose around 10% in morning trading.

headline: What Rubrik (RBRK)'s New Global BRaaS Partnership with Cognizant Means For Shareholders
summary: In late October 2025, Cognizant announced an expanded partnership with Rubrik to provide a global, subscription-based Business Resilience-as-a-Service (BRaaS) solution, aimed at enabling enterprises to quickly recover from cyber incidents and ransomware attacks. This initiative is among the first pay-as-you-go BRaaS offerings that aligns rapid recovery objectives with critical business outcomes, addressing increasing risks from AI adoption and cyber threats in the evolving IT...

headline: Cognizant (CTSH) Surpasses Q3 Earnings and Revenue Estimates
summary: Cognizant (CTSH) delivered earnings and revenue surprises of +7.75% and +1.63%, respectively, for the quarter ended September 2025. Do the numbers hold clues to what lies ahead for the stock?

headline: Cognizant: Q3 Earnings Snapshot
summary: TEANECK, N.J. (AP) — Cognizant Technology Solutions Corp. CTSH) on Wednesday reported third-quarter net income of $274 million. On a per-share basis, the Teaneck, New Jersey-based company said it had profit of 56 cents.
